Sokoto bụ ama ukwu no na Afrịka ala ana-kpo Naigeria.
Sokoto di na ebe ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ Nigeria na Ȯra Sokoto ( 13°04′00″N, 05°15′00″E)
O bụ ịsị óche Ȯra Sokoto (Sokoto State), onwéré mádu ha sị rùrù, 790,000 (2015; Sokoto agglomeration; calculation). Ama ugwu no na akuku Osimiri Sokoto (Sokoto river)
Oke udumiri nke Sokoto bų ǫnwa juun rue septemba
Ǫkǫchi na ebido na ǫnwa ǫktoba rue mee
Ozuzomiri ya bų ihe dika 629 mm nime otu afǫ.
